5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Amr bin Shu’aib, from his father, from his grandfather, that the Prophet (ﷺ) said the Takbir seven times and five times in the ‘Eid prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ يُكَبِّرُ الإِمَامُ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning how many times the Imam should say the Takbir in the Eid Prayers
